entries.npc_msn_05_greeting_01: Hi.  I think you probably need some work.
entries.npc_msn_05_busy_01: Of course.  Are you interested in something to do?
entries.npc_msn_05_work_02: I've got something you can do.
entries.npc_msn_05_presp_getmission_03: So do you have something for me?
entries.npc_msn_05_presp_getmission_05: Actually, I'm not ready to work right now.
entries.npc_msn_05_greeting_onmission: I'm not going to deal with you until you finish your job.
entries.npc_msn_05_friend_greeting_onmission: Aren't you supposed to be helping my friend, here?
entries.npc_msn_05_friend_work_01: You should speak to my friend. There's work to be done, but it's far too dangerous for me!
entries.npc_msn_05_greeting_onothermission: You look like you're already busy.
entries.npc_msn_05_decline: Oh my.  Well, I'll have to wait for someone else then...
entries.npc_msn_05_done_01: Well, come back if you change your mind.
